msbt.message: You're gonna be in the Fishing Tourney later, right? Think you've got what it takes to beat me?I mean, you probably do. I'm no anglerbut I wanna know if you THINK you do, !
You get points for every fish you catch in the tourney, right?So you might as well catch any old fish! See a shadow in the water? BAM! Don't hesitate!
You ever been around a fish from a pond or swamp? They smell, uh well, they smell.
From what I hear, the Fishing Tourney is off the hook.If you're gonna sign up, you'd better go talk to C.J. in the plaza. Go get 'em, !

Huh? Oh yeah. I know the tourney's goin' on. I just ain't in the mood for fishing today, .I woke up and it didn't feel like a fish day. Felt more like a bike day.Might be fish day next week. When it comes, I'll fish then. I don't need a tourney to tell me what to do!
